title: Request a Product Review After Purchase
description: A week after a customer's order is delivered, the system should automatically send an email asking them to review the products they bought.

tasks.description: Identify orders that were delivered 7 days ago.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates a list of eligible orders.

tasks.description: For each order, generate a personalized email that includes direct links to the review pages for the purchased products.
tasks.expected_outcome: System creates and sends personalized review request emails.
